<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11+"
    pfs=""
>
[Floating Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=319)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 587 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** strapped to 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _floating shield_ is usually carved with wing motifs. This [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1) (Hardness 6, HP 24, BT 12) can protect you on its own.

<document level="2" id="action-191" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Floating Shield
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 587 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Floating Shield (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 587 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 9,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the shield any number of times per day.
name: Floating Shield
